name: Burn-ON
description:
Controls: A, W, S, D to move

Download windows version for sound effects. There's no sound in browser version.

This game simulates life from beginning to end. Please note that the controls may not be what most people are used to and can change for every new round, as adapting to new things is a part of life. Life is like a flickering candle. It becomes even more unstable as people age. With every birthday cake eaten, the end approaches faster. So don't eat too many birthday cakes! 

Made for: Low Effort Game Jam 14

Theme: Birthday

Created with: GameMaker Studio

Notes: I planned to make this in 30 minutes, but it ended up taking over 2 hours.
